channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
ok guys im not nerdy little freakz like u guys are but i have started a client up for my friends im 22 btw they said it was good.. I need to no how to code i dunno how to its like copy paste this at java837437474837483748374 classs abillion <--If u guys no wat i mean and the files i got say u must go onto the internet to find em...
I basicly wanna no how to Command's Shop's cool admin areas My friends keep telling me to make a perfect ring etc spawning items is the only things i wont to no I did have allstar scape source but im downloading that richscape...
:eek: :eek: :eek: Oh and "BTW" the "TUTS" Dont help very much, :eek: :eek: :eek:

I basicly wanna no how to
Command’s
Shop’s
cool admin areas
My friends keep telling me to make a perfect ring etc
spawning items is the only things i wont to no
I did have allstar scape source but im downloading that richscape…

:eek: :eek: :eek:
Oh and “BTW” the “TUTS” Dont help very much, :eek: :eek: :eek:[/quote]

If you spoke more ‘English’ and made more ‘Sense’ Maybe I could help you. but unfortunately. your speaking FUCKING jibberish which hardly anyone can understand. Come back when you’ve learnt some good English

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Non of the things you want to know how to do is coding…it would just be copy and pasting if we told you how…

[code]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“command”)) { //open bracket
//what you want command to do here
} //close bracket[/code]

Read full topic
